thread.title: COM Express modules use 6th gen Intel Core CPU
thread.title_full: COM Express modules use 6th gen Intel Core CPU

title: COM Express modules use 6th gen Intel Core CPU
text:
09/15/2015 COM Express modules use 6th gen Intel Core CPU 
The conga-TC170 type 6 COM Express module uses sixth generation Intel Core-i3, -i5, or -i7 processors that take only 15 W TDP, making it usable for sealed, fanless systems. The board supports up to 32 Gbytes of fast dual channel DDR4 and Intel Gen 9 graphics for up to three independent 4k 60 Hz displays via DisplayPort 1.2. 
The card enables energy-efficient streaming of HD videos in both directions and has four USB 3.0 ports, eight USB 2.0 ports, three SATA Gen 3 ports, Gigabit Ethernet, and six PCIe Gen 3 lanes. The 3.74 x 3.74 inch card can be optionally be equipped with a discrete Trusted Platform Module (TPM 1.2/2.0) security.
